name: SOCIAL EMPOWERMENT AND AGRICULTURE DEVELOPMENT AGENCY (SEADA)
briefDescription: SOCIAL EMPOWERMENT AND AGRICULTURE DEVELOPMENT AGENCY (SEADA)is a non- political, non- profit making, secular voluntary organization registered under the Societies Registration Act XXI of 1860 in the year 2004 and Foreign Contribution Regulation Act in the year 2009.  The mission of the organization is “to improve social standard of living of poor and the marginalized and enhance their participation in development process so that wellbeing of, women, people with disabilities, farmers and other marginalized group is protected”. The major objectives of the organization is empowering community through active participation of community and children in all stages of program and projects so that well being of farmers.
